Math.floor($jq(window).width()*0.1);			$jq('.blockUI.blockMsg').css("width",width);			$jq('.blockUI.blockMsg').css("height",height);			$jq('.blockUI.blockMsg').css("left",left);			$jq('.blockUI.blockMsg').css("top",top);			$jq('.blockUI.blockMsg').css("overflow","auto");						// +$jq("#printArea").width()/2 +50;		}catch(e) {}				$jq("#hidden_message_id")        .css({            fontSize: "100px", //watermark font size             color: "brown", //watermark color             fontWeight: "bolder", //watermark font weight             fontFamily: "verdana", //watermark font family             position: "absolute", //watermark position 必須為 "absolute"             width: "100px", //watermark div width             top: msgTop, //watermark position top             left: msgLeft //watermark position left         })        .fadeTo("fast",0.3); //watermark 透明度 	}	function color             fontWeight: "bolder", //watermark font weight             fontFamily: "verdana", //watermark font family             position: "absolute", //watermark position 必須為 "absolute"             width: "120px", //watermark div width             top: msgTop, //watermark position top             left: msgLeft //watermark position left         })        .fadeTo("fast",0.3); //watermark 透明度
